name: apartment house 4
description: Archived model of a residential building (9 storey) Night lighting is made using light sources and grouped separately, also in the archive there are render settings (Corona) for day and night lighting. Export File: Fbx ====================================== The model is assembled as carefully as possible so that you can easily remove or add floors. if necessary and taking into account the use in the near-angles ====================================== Units in millimeters. No third-party plugin or script required. ====================================== Who works in the V-Ray version is lower than 3.1. Be careful, in the materials in the BRDF section there is a Microfaset GTR (GGX), if your version is older than 3.1, the BRDF field will be empty. Choose Blinn, Phong or Ward - which is preferable to you. For Corona render, it is recommended to install a version not lower than 1.5, since the glossiness of materials is customized taking into account PBR Enjoy using and beautiful renders! Show more
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2013 + fbx
Render:	 Vray+Corona
Size:	 41 MB
Style:	 Modern
Materials:	 Glass, Concrete
